Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-10220 affecting package kubernetes for versions less than 1.30.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-10220 affecting package kubernetes for versions less than 1.30.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubernetes is earlier than 1.30.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-10220
